channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache OpenMeetings
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache OpenMeetings

item.title: CVE-2017-7688|2024-09-17T03:02:48.446Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20openmeetings
item.description: Apache OpenMeetings 1.0.0 updates user password in insecure manner.

item.title: CVE-2017-7663|2024-09-17T03:08:15.636Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20openmeetings
item.description: Both global and Room chat are vulnerable to XSS attack in Apache OpenMeetings 3.2.0.

item.title: CVE-2017-7684|2024-09-17T03:18:54.640Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20openmeetings
item.description: Apache OpenMeetings 1.0.0 doesn't check contents of files being uploaded. An attacker can cause a denial of service by uploading multiple large files to the server.
